data.title: Materialise - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Materialise has acquired 7 companies, including 2 in the last 5 years. A total of 3 acquisitions came from private equity firms.
                Materialise’s largest acquisition to date was in 2014, when it acquired Meridian Technique for $13M. Materialise has acquired in 2 different US states, and 5 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include software (50%) and  business services (17%).
data.text:
Materialise M&A Summary

Materialise has acquired 7 companies, including 2 in the last 5 years. A total of 3 acquisitions came from private equity firms.

Materialise’s largest acquisition to date was in 2014, when it acquired Meridian Technique for $13M. Materialise has acquired in 2 different US states, and 5 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include software (50%) and business services (17%).

Materialise Business Overview
